articles.title: Car Accidents in St. Tammany Parish Explained by Personal Injury Attorney Ross F. Lagarde of Slidell, LA for HelloNation
articles.mainIdea: Car Accidents in St. Tammany Parish Explained by Personal Injury Attorney Ross F. Lagarde of Slidell, LA for HelloNation
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Car Accidents in St. Tammany Parish Explained by Personal Injury Attorney Ross F. Lagarde of Slidell, LA for HelloNation. SLIDELL, La., Dec. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- What should drivers do in the first minutes after a car accident in St. Tammany Parish? The answer is outlined in a HelloNation article that gives clear, local guidance for the moments that matter most. The article explains that safety comes first. Moving out of traffic, when possible, lowers the chance of a second impact and sets a calmer scene. HelloNation notes that calling the police once everyone is safe builds an official record.
